metadata.Title: CVE-2011-3821 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: xajax 0.6 beta1 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via a direct request to a .php file, which reveals the installation path in an error message, as demonstrated by xajax_core/plugin_layer/xajaxScriptPlugin.inc.php and certain other files.

criterions.comment: php-xajax: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
